entry.title: $2700 // Hot Location*Meat Packing District*Renovated Studio*Available Now
entry.content:
Open House by Appointment Only
Please include a Brief Summary + Contact Info

Available Now

$2,700 per month

This is a Gut Renovated Studio!

All apartments are newly renovated featuring: Ebony hardwood floors, recessed lighting, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, cherry wood cabinets, crown and baseboard moldings, with marble bathrooms.

entry.title: $2500 // Welcome home to this charming, jumbo West Chelsea apartment.
entry.content: Welcome home to this charming, jumbo West Chelsea apartment. The apartment faces South and receives wonderful natural light all day. It has original hardwood floors, exposed brick and a galley pass-through kitchen. A thoughtful floorplan with a generous walk-in closet, as well as a large dressing area. The building also has a new elevator, is pet friendly, and allows pied-a-terres and co-purchasing. Central laundry and live-in super. Conveniently located a few doors west of Ninth Ave and close to all that Chelsea has to offer; including amazing restaurants, nightlife, art galleries, Hudson River Park, Chelsea Piers sports complex and the Highline.
